protein.specific_function: DSP may be an important factor in dentinogenesis. DPP may bind high amount of calcium and facilitate initial mineralization of dentin matrix collagen as well as regulate the size and shape of the crystals

reference.reference_text: Gu K, Chang S, Ritchie HH, Clarkson BH, Rutherford RB: Molecular cloning of a human dentin sialophosphoprotein gene. Eur J Oral Sci. 2000 Feb;108(1):35-42.
